column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I will truthfully say it was not worth $50 maybe $30 at most. Not trying to be rude but wings were DRENCHED and soggy in the sauce. Pizza was to be honest meh
column2: crust was okay... don't know maybe it was an off day. I think they're making a huge profit just from the location and "name" won't be back but at least we tried it I guess. Lol never know till you try it :)
